website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive manual crank that is good for the hobby bee keeper.
pros: Can be cleaned without taking apart
Can hold frames of different sizes
cons: This product may seem greasy upon arrival and need to be cleaned before use

customer_reviews.title: Some major issues, but it works.
customer_reviews.text: It came fully assembled, but the parts weren't properly lined up and it wouldn't crank. I had to take it apart, put it back together properly and clean it. The entire unit was covered in black grease and fingerprints, gross but not the end of the world. Then after using it for about an hour for the first time, the handle snapped into two parts. I ended up attaching my drill to the unit and used that the crank the unit. I'm still giving it 2 stars and not just one star because a) it was less than $100 and b) it works fine (just not with the handle it came with).
customer_reviews.author: shopping addict

customer_reviews.title: INEXPENSIVE YET EFFECT
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for an inexpensive extractor than this one might work for you. Make sure you take this completely apart and clean it real well. The first thing I noticed was the smell, it had the grease/oily smell of an auto repair garage. There were also grease smudges inside. So again, take some time to really clean this. Taking it apart and putting it back together was not rocket science. The handle seems pretty flimsy, it is made from a soft metal. I don't anticipate this part lasting long. The crank/spinning motion is smooth. I just extracted (on 3/15/18) 8 frames of honey fairly easy.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher B.

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to anyone looking for a affordable extractor
customer_reviews.text: I used this once to extract 14 large frames of honey. I worked well. Being a hobbyist back yard beekeeper, this unit should last me for years. My reason for purchasing this unit is that it was the only unit I could find in this price range that is offered by a brand name company. I was afraid of the others in this price range that were from companies that were not recognized beekeeping supply companies. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a affordable extractor. Of course I would not expect it to hold up a large scale commercial application.
customer_reviews.author: Wiliford

customer_reviews.title: It broke the first time we used it
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this extractor, two of the metal rods that hold the frames in place broke right off and then got caught in the spinning mechanism. I got my honey, but this product was obviously never meant to last. I urge you to buy something else. Follow-up: When I told the company about my experience, they were quick to offer and ship a replacement basket. Because of their good service, I am changing my rating from 2 stars to 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: gypsypitcrew

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I gave five stars because it's worth it for the price. Can't spin too fast or it'll start shaking badly so you have to take a little more time no matter how perfect you balance the frames from each other. Perfect for a hobby beekeeper.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome
customer_reviews.text: My brother has been very happy with this and has used it to jar up a lot of honey. Easy to clean and tear down for storage when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Works the way it needs to
customer_reviews.text: It’s never going to be easy to clean. Because it’s honey and wax. But I let the bees clean whatever was left. I processed 20 frames or more... probably more and it worked well. I didn’t like that the handle came off a lot but what can you do. I chose no stand because of other products reviews and I think it’s the best choice.
customer_reviews.author: Shaneka

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I actually like this one better than the motorized one we use at work. Great for home use. Easy to put together and disassemble. Worked very well. Like all extractors it roamed when in use. Jumped really. We fixed this problem by having my son sit on the lid.
customer_reviews.author: M O'Rourke

customer_reviews.title: Works great for our single hive
customer_reviews.text: Apart from having to re-tighten all the bolts to make sure handle and gear stay on, this works exactly as expected. If you're looking to start off with a honey extractor, this is probably the way to go. Works great for our single hive.
customer_reviews.author: KFed

customer_reviews.title: Good for the small guy
customer_reviews.text: I have only a few 8 frame hives, so this is pretty decent for me. It gets the honey out like it is supposed to. Pure wax frames will blow out , so it might be better suited to someone who only uses plastic foundation. It will wobble alot, that is because the frames are unbalanced, not the fault of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: howard miller

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk.
customer_reviews.text: This is what happens when you try to spin the basket. Also had 2 welded rods break off sides of basket with first use. Maybe my husband can fix this,maybe not. But I need it now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clean this well
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t have many frames to spin, this will work well.. Make sure you clean it well though. The very bottom of it was disgusting when I got it. It took two complete washes to get it clean. Aside from that it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Used once, did not work very well. Shaft slipped when cranking. Had to modify crank handle, still hit the lid when cranked. Only good thing was no problem returning.
customer_reviews.author: Gary W Price

customer_reviews.title: manual is hard.
customer_reviews.text: The Product met all expectations as described in the description. The Problem I had was on my end. When I spun it at high speed it would wobble. I had nothing with wt. to secure it too. Since this was my first extractor it was a learning experience. I give the Company 5 stars on their handling my request for a refund in a timely manner. You may pass this on to them. I realized I need a motorized extractor.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan little

customer_reviews.title: Thorough cleaning necessary
customer_reviews.text: For a necessary food-grade item, this arrived stinking of grease and lube oil. I spent 90 minutes washing it. Recommend multiple degrease wipe downs, thorough rinse, and then multiple mild soap and water scrub/rinses. You’re finished when a clean paper towel wipe w/o any black residue on it and smell of industrial grease is gone. WuTang!
customer_reviews.author: Colin W!

customer_reviews.title: Good Honey Extractor
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time this year. It was priced right and worked out great!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great little extractor for price it does need a good ...
customer_reviews.text: Great little extractor for price it does need a good cleaning before use but you should clean anything you buy new before you put food items in it but great product for a beginner or someone wanting to extract small batches.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Barker

customer_reviews.title: Well built and ships fast.
customer_reviews.text: This two frame extractor worked great and arrived in 3 days after ordering. It’s built well but does need a deep cleaning prior to first use. The only thing that would make it better is if the handle spun freely on the crank. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Avid skater Mom

customer_reviews.title: Poor spot welds on the upper bearing
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the first two loads then the spot welds that hold the upper bearing onto the cross member broke. I re welded it seems fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew G. Knight

customer_reviews.title: 2 frames at once
customer_reviews.text: The hardware is not very compatible with US tools. Made a little difficult to disassemble but worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. S

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: It’s a wobbly monster, having to weight on the bottom. Spinning mechanism needs to be oiled every time I sanitize it. Otherwise does an excellent job, spins efficiently, easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Ru

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me. I only have 1 or 2 hives a year.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Fetzer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We used this product to extract Honey from the comb frames. It is self propelled by hand. We took the handle off and attached our drill and used that to propel the sooner inside. Easy-Peasy!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Phares Haydon

customer_reviews.title: Good value, well constructed.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the hobbiest bee keeper that wants to give family and friends honey.
customer_reviews.author: Mike King

customer_reviews.title: Works great but hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect but the insides do not appear to come apart to clean.
customer_reviews.author: PFS

customer_reviews.title: Great price, easy to use and economical since we ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price, easy to use and economical since we only have 2 hives. Found it a little difficult to take apart to clean, but overall it did a very good job extracting honey.
customer_reviews.author: Micheline Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The extractor worked well we had a little problem with the basket. Vivo rep took real good care of us we will order more bee stuff from them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost
customer_reviews.text: A couple of basic repairs and repositioning of gear set and this could be a great unit.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work d good but not as sturdy as we would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect! Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! Easy to use. It can hold about five gallons before you need to drain it. Great for the small-scale keeper on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Carol

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job for the price
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job for the money. It would be nice if the gate valve was mounted lower it's hard to get the honey out of the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It has metal gears, I'm surprised it's built this well.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love it. We processed 5 8frame supers in a couple hours. Minimal clean up. We recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Dillion

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price and fits 10 inch and 5 inch frames
customer_reviews.author: christian hirt

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your time ordering this product.
customer_reviews.text: The mechanics are not well thought out and the gears loosen with use and the bolts come out. Not even worth it. Bad design.
customer_reviews.author: cindi dixon

customer_reviews.title: Cheap.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product. It is very cheaply made. Almost immediately started to rust. I had to basically take it completely apart and put it back together using better parts. I would not recommend. Get something worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: nothingnew

product_meta.title: VIVO 2 Frame Stainless Steel Manual Crank Bee Honey Extractor, SS Honeycomb Spinner Drum (BEE-V002C)
feature_bullets: DURABLE - For long lasting use, this two frame honey extractor operates with sturdy metal gears.
FRAMES - This honey extractor fits shallow, medium, and deep frames.
STEEL DRUM - The drum on this two-frame honey extractor is 29" tall and 13.5" in diameter, perfect for extracting a lot of honey at one time.
STAINLESS STEEL - With a smooth stainless steel finish, BEE-V002C is designed to help you save time and energy.
1 YEAR WARRANTY - This honey extractor comes with a limited 1-year Manufacturer warranty as well as friendly tech support to help with any questions or concerns.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars66 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
